mapper.select: select * from m_terminal_version order by tVersion desc
mapper.update: update m_terminal_version set tVersion = #{tVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oVersion = #{oVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `describe` = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, downUrl = #{downUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operatorMan = #{operatorMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operatorTime = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, terminalList = #{terminalList,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
